card.name: Assembled Ensemble
card.text: VigilanceAssembled Ensemble's power is equal to the number of Robots you control.Whenever you cast a spell with an artifact creature in its art, create a 1/1 white Clown Robot artifact creature token.

card.name: Blood Crypt
card.text: ({T}: Add {B} or {R}.)As Blood Crypt enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Killer Cosplay
card.text: Whenever Killer Cosplay becomes attached to a creature, choose a creature card name with an identical mana cost. That creature becomes a copy of the card with the chosen name until Killer Cosplay becomes unattached from it.Equip {3}

card.name: Saw in Half
card.text: Destroy target creature. If that creature dies this way, its controller creates two tokens that are copies of that creature, except their base power is half that creature's power and their base toughness is half that creature's toughness. Round up each time.

card.name: The Space Family Goblinson
card.text: The Space Family Goblinson has trample as long as you've rolled three or more dice this turn.Whenever you roll a die, put a +1/+1 counter on The Space Family Goblinson.

card.name: The Space Family Goblinson
card.text: The Space Family Goblinson has trample as long as you've rolled three or more dice this turn.Whenever you roll a die, put a +1/+1 counter on The Space Family Goblinson.

card.name: Water Gun Balloon Game
card.text: As Water Gun Balloon Game enters the battlefield, each player puts a pop! counter on "0."Whenever a player casts a spell, move that player's pop! counter up one.Whenever a player's pop! counter hits "5," that player creates a 5/5 pink Giant Teddy Bear creature token and resets all pop! counters to "0."

card.name: Watery Grave
card.text: ({T}: Add {U} or {B}.)As Watery Grave enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Atsushi, the Blazing Sky
card.text: Flying, trampleWhen Atsushi, the Blazing Sky dies, choose one —• Exile the top two cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.• Create three Treasure tokens.

card.name: Consider
card.text: Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.Draw a card.

card.name: Fateful Absence
card.text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker. Its controller investigates. (They create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

card.name: Hidetsugu, Devouring Chaos
card.text: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Scry 2.{2}{R}, {T}: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. When you exile a nonland card this way, Hidetsugu, Devouring Chaos deals damage equal to the exiled card's mana value to any target.

card.name: Kaito Shizuki
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if Kaito Shizuki entered the battlefield this turn, he phases out.+1: Draw a card. Then discard a card unless you attacked this turn.−2: Create a 1/1 blue Ninja creature token with "This creature can't be blocked."−7: You get an emblem with "Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, search your library for a blue or black creature card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle."

card.name: Satoru Umezawa
card.text: Whenever you activate a ninjutsu ability, look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. This ability triggers only once each turn.Each creature card in your hand has ninjutsu {2}{U}{B}.

card.name: Tamiyo, Compleated Sage
card.text: Compleated ({GP/UP} can be paid with {G}, {U}, or 2 life. If life was paid, this planeswalker enterers with two fewer loyalty counters.)+1: Tap up to one target artifact or creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.−X: Exile target nonland permanent card with mana value X from your graveyard. Create a token that's a copy of that card.−7: Create Tamiyo's Notebook, a legendary colorless artifact token with "Spells you cast cost {2} less to cast" and "{T}: Draw a card."
